title: Music--Choir from The Triumph of Maximilian I
description: Plates 25-26 (double-page); Car drawn by 2 wizends (bison); choir, cornet players, trombonists. Kapellmeister Jorg Slakeny, director, Stewdl, leader of trombonists; Augustin, leader of cornet players. Car decorated with Apollo and Muses and Bishop\'s throne.
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
